TextLibrary.Text: There's Cargo at Gemini Labs. We should use it to make something that can help us.
There's Cargo at Gemini Labs. We should use it to make something that can help us.
I'm a scientist. I can create things for your ship. Find the Cargo and I'll show you what I mean.
I'm a scientist. I can create things for your ship. Find the Cargo and I'll show you what I mean.
